properties.name: app.monitoring.pod-name
properties.description: Application pod name monitoring common tag

properties.name: app.monitoring.pod-namespace
properties.description: Application pod namespace monitoring common tag

properties.name: app.monitoring.node-name
properties.description: Application node name monitoring common tag

properties.name: app.giga-chat.auth-api-base-url
properties.description: Giga Chat API auth base URL

properties.name: app.giga-chat.auth-retry-timeout-ms
properties.description: Giga Chat API authorization retry timeout in seconds

properties.name: app.telegram-bot.rest-api-base-url
properties.description: Telegram bot API rest base URL

properties.name: app.telegram-bot.update-limit
properties.description: Telegram bot max messages to get on update (0 - 100)

properties.name: app.telegram-bot.update-timeout-sec
properties.description: Telegram bot update API long polling timeout seconds

properties.name: app.telegram-bot.request-timeout-ms
properties.description: Telegram bot API request timeout in milliseconds

properties.name: app.telegram-bot.max-retries
properties.description: Telegram bot API request max retries on failure
